alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 2:03AM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Tonto Basin, San Carlos, Globe/Miami and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
